Hala Lotfy (amụrụ n'afọ 1973) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na onye na-emepụta ihe nkiri n'Ijipt
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Cairo Film Institute n'afọ 1999

A maara ya nke ọma maka ihe nkiri izizi ya bụ Al Khorug lel Nahar (Coming Forth By Day, 2012) nke gosiputara Donia Maher na nke ritere ọtụtụ ihe nrite na mmemme ihe nkiri, gụnyere FIPRESCI Prize na Abu Dhabi Film Festival
Ọrụ ya ndị ọzọ a ma ama gụnyere ihe ngosi Feeling Cold (2005) na ọtụtụ ihe ngosi maka usoro Al Jazeera Arabs of Latin America (2006).
